message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you, and I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $9,500.  This product is truly top-of-the-line and worth every penny. What do you say?
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am still only able to offer $8,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? This would be a fair price for both of us.
Thank you for considering my position, Alice. I am still unable to go above $8,000 for the product. I hope this offer meets your needs.

Bob, I'm seeing a pattern here and I'm sensing some hesitation.  I need to make sure this product goes to someone who truly values it. My final offer is $8,750. This is a steal for what you're getting.  Let me know if you're ready to make a deal.
Alice, thank you for your persistence. I appreciate the value of the product and I am willing to increase my offer to $8,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
